title: Flamingals Straight Leg Button Fly Jeans for Women Multi Pocket Mid Rise Jeans Without Belt Denim Pants
description: Features: Mid-waist with button and zipper closure, these straight leg jeans have a high stretch quality for a comfortable fit. With a functional pocket design, they're suit for casual wear and beyond. Elevate your style and personality with these chic jeans that flatter your figure

Material: Made from carefully chosen super stretch fabric to ensure our customers feel comfortable in all positions, whether sitting or squatting. The soft, lightweight, and breathable fabric reduces any sense of restriction

Occasion: This garment is remarkably versatile and can be worn on a variety of occasions. Whether you're running errands, attending a casual get-together, or heading to the office, this piece is the suit choice. It's even suitable for more formal events like parties or dinners out. Additionally, it's an excellent option for students, working professionals, and anyone who wants to look stylish and feel comfortable

Flamingals jeans are a versatile choice, especially to show your style.The pants characterized by its relaxed, laid-back, and eclectic vibe, allows you to embrace your inner free spirit and create a personalized and effortlessly chic ensemble.

Please refer to size measurement in the last item picture. As outfits fit experts, our sizing is based on a true-to-size fit. Since the fabric is super stretchy, we recommend you follow the exact size that fits you in the table
